name: MAIZE SURVIVAL
description:
MAZE SURVIVAL
created by CHARLES JOEL

the aim of the game is to go round the maize and try to collect
all the coins without getting bit by a spider. You are given three
lives and once they are exhausted you start again.The coins give
you two (2) points while the gold bars give you (5) points.
But the fundamentals of this game is having fun,so just play and
enjoy and don't forget to share and play with friends.
